DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare LoS treatment oral anticoagulant initiation hospital discharge patient hospitalize subsequently treat dabigatran warfarin non-valvular atrial fibrillation real-world Japanese clinical practice . The secondary objective study compare LoS patient hospitalize 1 ) acute ischemic stroke , 2 ) due non-valvular atrial fibrillation . Other objective ( 1 ) compare in-hospital direct indirect-related cost dabigatran warfarin , ( 2 ) compare rate patient directly discharge home index hospitalization dabigatran warfarin .
DOC.brief_title: Length Stay NVAF Patients Hospitalized Initiated With Dabigatran Warfarin Japan
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Hospitalized patient among patient visit record confirm diagnosis NVAF ( ICD10 Code : I48 ) prescribe dabigatran warfarin hospitalization period Exclusion criterion : 1 . Having record diagnosis atrial flutter , valvular atrial fibrillation postoperative atrial fibrillation diagnosis standard disease name study period . 2 . Having record diagnosis rheumatic atrial fibrillation ( ICD10 code I05 I09 [ chronic rheumatic atrial fibrillation ] ) mechanicalvalvular atrial fibrillation ( ICD10 code T820 [ artificial cardiac valve mechanical complication ] ) study period . 3 . Having record confirm diagnosis cancer ( ICD10 code C00C97 [ malignant neoplasm ] ) study period . 4 . Having record dialysis ( class J038 artificial kidney ) study period . 5 . Having record dabigatran use purpose prevention ischemic stroke systemic embolism nonvalvular atrial fibrillation patient . 6 . Having record dabigatran warfarin hospitalization 7 . Having record new diagnosis atrial fibrillation initiation dabigatran warfarin treatment hospitalization period .
